thing-type.label: Generic ONVIF IP camera with no API support.
thing-type.description: Use when the binding does not list your brand of ONVIF Camera

parameter.name: IPADDRESS
parameter.label: IP Address
parameter.description: Use this format 192.168.1.2 and do not include the port number.

parameter.name: ONVIF_PORT
parameter.label: ONVIF Port
parameter.description: The port your camera uses for ONVIF connections.

parameter.name: USERNAME
parameter.label: User name for camera.
parameter.description: Enter the User name used to connect to your camera. Leave blank if your camera does not use login details.

parameter.name: PASSWORD
parameter.label: Password for camera.
parameter.description: Enter Password for your camera. Leave blank if your camera does not use login details.

parameter.name: ONVIF_MEDIA_PROFILE
parameter.label: ONVIF Media Profile stream number.
parameter.description: Cameras can supply more than one stream at different resolutions and formats. This selects the main or one of the substreams. Sometimes you need to turn on substreams before they can be seen.

parameter.name: POLL_CAMERA_MS
parameter.label: Time in milliseconds between checking camera states and fetching an Image.
parameter.description: Camera states are not just alarms but can also be missing SD cards or full storage alerts. Default is "5000" which is 5 seconds.
